description: This PHP source file defines utility functions used across a web UI component for network device management, including session handling, string wrapping based on device mode, data extraction from device data models, time conversions, and other helper routines.

methods.name: php_getstr
methods.description: Wraps a string with behavior conditional on 'psmMode'. Returns an empty string for WiFi or MoCA if PSM mode is enabled.

methods.name: php_getinstanceids
methods.description: Wraps a parameter string with behavior conditional on 'psmMode'. Returns an empty string for WiFi or MoCA if PSM mode is enabled.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Maps device model data to key-value pairs, extracting specific parameters from a root object for use in scripts.

methods.name: encrypt_map
methods.description: Returns a human-readable description of encryption mode based on mode and method strings.

methods.name: getLeafName
methods.description: Extracts the leaf parameter name from a full device model path given its root.

methods.name: getObjIdInPath
methods.description: Extracts the object ID ({i}) portion from a device model path.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Wraps a device data retrieval API, returning structured parameter values keyed by parameter names for multiple device objects.

methods.name: init_psmMode
methods.description: Generates a webpage overlay indicating the device is in PSM (battery) mode if enabled.

methods.name: php_str_and
methods.description: Performs bitwise AND operation between two hex string representations.

methods.name: array_trim
methods.description: Removes whitespace and empty entries from an array.

methods.name: fetchAdditionalSubnetTable
methods.description: Retrieves additional subnet configurations from the device, returning an array or null if fails.

methods.name: getDefault
methods.description: Reads default configuration values from an XML file based on specified parameter names.

methods.name: div_sub
methods.description: Performs division with subtraction, returning quotient and remainder.

methods.name: hm_to_sec
methods.description: Converts hours and minutes format to total seconds.

methods.name: sec_to_hm
methods.description: Converts seconds into hours and minutes string format.

methods.name: shift_blockedDays
methods.description: Shifts an array of blocked days forward or backward in a weekly cycle.

methods.name: group_2D_array
methods.description: Groups a 2D array by specified fields.

methods.name: local_to_UTC_Time
methods.description: Converts local time and blocked days into UTC time, adjusting days if crossing midnight.

methods.name: UTC_to_local_Time
methods.description: Converts UTC time and blocked days into local time, adjusting days if crossing midnight.

methods.name: UTC_to_local_date_logs
methods.description: Converts UTC timestamp into local date string for logs.

methods.name: time_in_min
methods.description: Converts HH:MM time to total minutes.

methods.name: cmp
methods.description: Comparator function for sorting schedules based on start time.

methods.name: merge_days
methods.description: Merges schedule entries with contiguous or overlapping times.

methods.name: days_time_conversion_get
methods.description: Transforms schedule data into a flattened array of day-based sessions.

methods.name: days_time_conversion_set
methods.description: Generates schedule times with day crossing considerations in mind.

methods.name: time_date_conflict
methods.description: Checks for time and day overlaps between two schedule entries.

methods.name: resolve_IPV6_global_address
methods.description: Determines the correct global IPv6 address from two potential sources.

methods.name: ProcessLay1Interface
methods.description: Translates device layer 1 interface strings into human-readable network connection types.

methods.name: get_wan_type
methods.description: Determines if the device WAN connection type is DOCSIS or EPON based on device model.
